title: Coming soon ...
description: Highlights for this release: * New stochastic gradient descent module by Peter Prettenhofer * Improved svm module: memory efficiency, automatic class weights. * Wrap for liblinear's Multi-class SVC (option multi_class in LinearSVC) * New features and performance improvements of text feature extraction. * Improved sparse matrix support, both in main classes (GridSearch) as in sparse …
dc:creator: Fabian Pedregosa
